newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Oil Search buys 10.1 pct of Discovery.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Oil Search buys 10.1 pct of Discovery.

text.p: Oil Search Ltd said on Friday it had bought a 10.1 percent stake, or 13.15 million shares, in takeover target Discovery Petroleum NL.

Oil Search, which is based in the Papua New Guinea capital of Port Moresby, said the purchase was a timely and strategic investment in a well-managed company with exploration and development potential, particulary in Southeast Asia.
"Oil Search is reviewing a number of options to maximise its investment in Discovery," the company said.
Brokerage firm James Capel crossed the parcel in Friday morning trade at 75 cents each, five cents above the hostile offer made by Premier Oil Plc on Monday.
Discovery shares were one cent higher at a year's high of 77 cents at 12.55 p.m. (0255 GMT). --Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
